Subroutine vom_gstom

958 : 
959 : !+++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++
960 : !+++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++
961 : !+++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++
962 : !*-----calculate gstom, et and ass -------------------------------------
963 : 
964 :       subroutine vom_gstom ()
965 :       use vegmod
966 :       use vegwatmod
967 :       implicit none
968 : 
969 :       REAL*8 :: cond1, cond2
970 :       REAL*8 :: cond3(3,3)
971 :       REAL*8 :: part1, part2, part3, part4, part5
972 :       REAL*8 :: part6, part7, part8, part9
973 : 
974 :       if (par_ .gt. 0.d0) then
975 : !       * adaptation of topt to air temperature during sunlight
976 :         topt_ = topt_ + toptfac * (tair + 273.d0 - topt_)
977 :         jact_(:)   = (1.d0 - E__ ** (-(alpha * par_) / jmax__(:)))     &
978 :      &             * jmax__(:) * pc_         ! (3.23), (Out[311])
979 :         jactg(1,:) = (1.d0 - E__ ** (-(alpha * par_) / jmaxg__(:)))    &
980 :      &             * jmaxg__(:) * pcg_(1)    ! (3.23), (Out[311])
981 :         jactg(2,:) = (1.d0 - E__ ** (-(alpha * par_) / jmaxg__(:)))    &
982 :      &             * jmaxg__(:) * pcg_(2)    ! (3.23), (Out[311])
983 :         jactg(3,:) = (1.d0 - E__ ** (-(alpha * par_) / jmaxg__(:)))    &
984 :      &             * jmaxg__(:) * pcg_(3)    ! (3.23), (Out[311])
985 : 
986 :         cond1      = (2.d0 * a__ * vd__) / (ca_ + 2.d0 * gammastar)
987 :         cond2      = (4.d0 * ca_ * rl__(2) + 8.d0 * gammastar * rl__(2)) &
988 :      &             / (ca_ - gammastar)
989 :         cond3(:,:) = (4.d0 * ca_ * rlg__(:,:) + 8.d0 * gammastar * rlg__(:,:)) &
990 :      &             / (ca_ - gammastar)
991 : 
992 :         if (vd__ .gt. 0.d0 .and. lambda_ .gt. cond1 .and. jact_(2) .gt. cond2) then
993 : 
994 : !          gstom__ = MAX(0.d0, (0.25d0 * (a__ * (ca_ * (jact_(2) - 4.d0 &
995 : !     &            * rl__(2)) - 4.d0 * gammastar * (jact_(2) + 2.d0     &
996 : !     &            * rl__(2))) * vd__ * (ca_ * lambda_ + 2.d0           &
997 : !     &            * gammastar * lambda_ - a__ * vd__)                  &
998 : !     &            + 1.7320508075688772d0 * SQRT(a__ * gammastar        &
999 : !     &            * jact_(2) * (ca_ * (jact_(2) - 4.d0 * rl__(2))      &
1000 : !     &            - gammastar * (jact_(2) + 8.d0 * rl__(2))) * vd__    &
1001 : !     &            * (ca_ * lambda_ + 2.d0 * gammastar * lambda_        &
1002 : !     &            - 2.d0 * a__ * vd__) ** 2.d0 * (ca_ * lambda_        &
1003 : !     &            + 2.d0 * gammastar * lambda_ - a__ * vd__))))        &
1004 : !     &            / (a__ * (ca_ + 2.d0 * gammastar) ** 2.d0 * vd__     &
1005 : !     &            * (ca_ * lambda_ + 2.d0 * gammastar * lambda_ - a__ * vd__)))
1006 : 
1007 :           part1 = ca_ + 2.d0 * gammastar
1008 :           part2 = part1 * lambda_ - a__ * vd__
1009 :           part3 = a__ * vd__ * part2
1010 : 
1011 :           part4 = ca_ * (jact_(2) - 4.d0 * rl__(2))
1012 :           part5 = gammastar * jact_(2)
1013 :           part6 = gammastar * 8.d0 * rl__(2)
1014 :           part7 = part4 - part5 - part6
1015 : 
1016 :           part8 = Sqrt(part5 * part7 * (part2 - a__ * vd__) ** 2.d0 * part3)
1017 :           part9 = part7 - 3.d0 * part5 + 1.7320508075688772d0 * part8 / part3
1018 : 
1019 :           gstom__ = 0.25d0 * part9 / part1**2.d0
1020 :           gstom__ = Max(0.d0, gstom__)       ! (Out[314])
1021 : 
1022 :         else
1023 :           gstom__ = 0.d0
1024 :         endif
1025 :         transp_ = a__ * vd__ * gstom__       ! (3.28) transpiration rate in mol/s
1026 :         etm__ = (transp_ * 18.d0) / (10.d0 ** 6.d0)  ! transpiration rate in m/s
1027 : 
1028 :         where (vd__ .gt. 0.d0 .and. lambdag .gt. cond1 .and. jactg(:,:) .gt. cond3(:,:))
1029 :           gstomg__(:,:) = MAX(0.d0,(0.25d0 * (a__ * (ca_ * (jactg(:,:) &
1030 :      &                  - 4.d0 * rlg__(:,:)) - 4.d0 * gammastar        &
1031 :      &                  * (jactg(:,:) + 2.d0 * rlg__(:,:))) * vd__     &
1032 :      &                  * (ca_ * lambdag + 2.d0 * gammastar * lambdag  &
1033 :      &                  - a__ * vd__) + 1.7320508075688772d0           &
1034 :      &                  * SQRT(a__ * gammastar * jactg(:,:) * (ca_     &
1035 :      &                  * (jactg(:,:) - 4.d0 * rlg__(:,:)) - gammastar &
1036 :      &                  * (jactg(:,:) + 8.d0 * rlg__(:,:))) * vd__     &
1037 :      &                  * (ca_ * lambdag + 2.d0 * gammastar * lambdag  &
1038 :      &                  - 2.d0 * a__ * vd__) ** 2.d0 * (ca_ * lambdag  &
1039 :      &                  + 2.d0 * gammastar * lambdag - a__ * vd__))))  &
1040 :      &                  / (a__ * (ca_ + 2.d0 * gammastar) ** 2.d0      &
1041 :      &                  * vd__ * (ca_ * lambdag + 2.d0 * gammastar     &
1042 :      &                  * lambdag - a__ * vd__)))  ! (Out[314])
1043 :         elsewhere
1044 :           gstomg__(:,:) = 0.d0
1045 :         endwhere
1046 :         transpg(:,:) = a__ * vd__ * gstomg__(:,:)  ! (3.28) transpiration rate in mol/s
1047 :         etmg__(:,:) = (transpg(:,:) * 18.d0) / (10.d0 ** 6.d0)  ! transpiration rate in m/s
1048 :       else
1049 :         par_          = 0.d0
1050 :         jact_(:)      = 0.d0
1051 :         gstom__       = 0.d0
1052 :         etm__         = 0.d0
1053 :         jactg(:,:)    = 0.d0
1054 :         gstomg__(:,:) = 0.d0
1055 :         etmg__(:,:)   = 0.d0
1056 :       endif
1057 : 
1058 :       return
1059 :       end subroutine vom_gstom
